biotools.summary: A web application for homology-based modeling of RNA loops utilizing template structures extracted from the PDB. It allows the insertion and replacement of loop structures of a desired sequence into an existing RNA structure. Furthermore, a comprehensive database of loops in RNA structures can be accessed through the web interface.

bioschemas.name: RLooM
